name: Canine Conundrums for all Occasions Quiz | Animals | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the name of Franklin D. Roosevelt's Scottish terrier?
questions.explanation:
Fala.

	Fala was given as a gift to FDR in 1940 by his cousin and friend Margaret "Daisy" Suckley. Fala's birth name was Big Boy, but Roosevelt changed it to Murray The Outlaw of Falahill after a famous Scottish ancestor of his. This was later shortened to just "Fala".  Fala often traveled with FDR and was present at many important events of his presidency.

questions.text: Shaggy's best friend Scooby-Doo was which breed of dog?
questions.explanation:
Great Dane.

	The original Hanna-Barbera show, "Scooby-Doo, Where Are You!" premiered on September 13, 1969 as an element of the CBS Saturday morning cartoon lineup. Scoob's voice was provided by voice acting legend Don Messick, who had earlier played another Hanna-Barbera cartoon dog, Astro on "The Jetsons".

questions.text: Which breed of dog had the most American Kennel Club registrations in 1999?
questions.explanation:
Labrador Retriever.

	A perennial favorite, the labrador comes with a black, brown or yellow coat.

questions.text: This is believed to be one of the oldest breeds of dog, dating from 6000 B.C..  Which breed is this?
questions.explanation:
Saluki.

	The Saluki is listed as one of the oldest breeds, along with the Chow Chow, Afghan hound and Samoyed. The other breeds listed are relatively recent.

questions.text: The dingo is a wild dog native to which country?
Which breed's name is French for butterfly?
questions.explanation:
Papillon.

	The name comes from the shape of the dog's ears, which resemble a butterfly.

questions.text: This breed is Queen Elizabeth II's favorite companion dog.
questions.explanation:
Pembroke Welsh Corgi.

	These feisty little dogs were originally used to herd livestock.

questions.text: This breed of dog is famous for its wrinkled appearance.
questions.explanation:
Shar Pei.

	This breed originated in China and was, at one time, one of the rarest breeds known.

questions.text: All domestic dogs are this species.
Lyndon Johnson had a famous pair of beagles. What were their names?
